title: Subtraction
text: Remember that f-g is the same as $$(f-g)(x)$$. All we have to do is add the two functions.
speech: Remember that f-g is the same as  times, parentheses f minus g,  times x . All we have to do is add the two functions.

. All we have to do is add the two functions.

title: Subtraction
text: There are no like terms to combine, so the answer is just the difference of the two functions.
speech: There are no like terms to combine, so the answer is just the difference of the two functions.
